entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
